title: How To Catch A Cheater With Math

media:group.media:title: How To Catch A Cheater With Math
media:group.media:description:
Try catching cheaters yourself: https://primerlearning.org/

Support these videos on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/primerlearning
Plush blobs and other stuff: https://store.dftba.com/collections/primer

Binomial probability example (the whole section on Khan Academy may be helpful)
https://www.khanacademy.org/math/statistics-probability/random-variables-stats-library/binomial-random-variables/v/probability-of-making-2-shots-in-6-attempts

For discussion and updates
- Discord: https://discord.gg/NbruaNW
- Twitter: @primerlearning
- Reddit: r/primerlearning

Made with Unity and Manim
https://github.com/Helpsypoo/PrimerUnity
https://www.manim.community/
